trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: New-Module
trans-unit.target: New-Module

trans-unit.source: New-Module
trans-unit.target: New-Module

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Creates a new dynamic module that exists only in memory.
trans-unit.target: 建立只存在記憶體中的新動態模組。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: ScriptBlock (Default)
trans-unit.target: 指令碼區塊 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: 名稱

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **New-Module** cmdlet creates a dynamic module from a script block.
trans-unit.target: **New-module** cmdlet 會從指令碼區塊建立動態模組。

trans-unit.source: The members of the dynamic module, such as functions and variables, are immediately available in the session and remain available until you close the session.
trans-unit.target: 動態模組的成員 (例如函式與變數) 可立即在工作階段中使用，而且在您關閉工作階段之前保持可用。

trans-unit.source: Like static modules, by default, the cmdlets and functions in a dynamic module are exported and the variables and aliases are not.
trans-unit.target: 類似靜態模組，預設會匯出動態模組中的 Cmdlet 與函式，而不會匯出變數與別名。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use the Export-ModuleMember cmdlet and the parameters of **New-Module** to override the defaults.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以使用 Export-modulemember cmdlet 和參數 **New-module** 覆寫預設值。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the *AsCustomObject* parameter of **New-Module** to return the dynamic module as a custom object.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 *AsCustomObject* 參數 **New-module** 傳回以自訂物件的動態模組。

trans-unit.source: The members of the modules, such as functions, are implemented as script methods of the custom object instead of being imported into the session.
trans-unit.target: 模組的成員 (例如函式) 會以自訂物件的指令碼方法實作，而不會匯入到工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic modules exist only in memory, not on disk.
trans-unit.target: 動態模組只存在於記憶體中，不在磁碟上。

trans-unit.source: Like all modules, the members of dynamic modules run in a private module scope that is a child of the global scope.
trans-unit.target: 類似所有模組，動態模組的成員會在全域範圍的子系私人模組範圍中執行。

trans-unit.source: Get-Module cannot get a dynamic module, but Get-Command can get the exported members.
trans-unit.target: Get-Module 無法取得動態模組，但是 Get-Command 可以取得匯出的成員。

trans-unit.source: To make a dynamic module available to **Get-Module**, pipe a **New-Module** command to Import-Module, or pipe the module object that **New-Module** returns to **Import-Module**.
trans-unit.target: 要提供給動態模組 **Get-module**, ，管道 **New-module** 命令來匯入模組或管道模組物件 **New-module** 傳回 **匯入模組**。

trans-unit.source: This action adds the dynamic module to the **Get-Module** list, but it does not save the module to disk or make it persistent.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作會將動態模組，以 **Get-module** 清單中，但是它不會儲存到磁碟或使持續性的模組。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Create a dynamic module
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 建立動態模組

trans-unit.source: This command creates a new dynamic module with a function called Hello.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會建立名為 Hello 的函式的新動態模組。

trans-unit.source: The command returns a module object that represents the new dynamic module.
trans-unit.target: 此命令傳回代表新動態模組的模組物件。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Working with dynamic modules and Get-Module and Get-Command
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 使用動態模組，Get-module 和 Get 命令

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates that dynamic modules are not returned by the **Get-Module** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會示範動態模組不會傳回由 **Get-module** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The members that they export are returned by the **Get-Command** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 它們會匯出的成員會傳回 **Get-command** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Export a variable into the current session
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 匯出到目前的工作階段變數

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Export-ModuleMember** cmdlet to export a variable into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **Export-modulemember** 指令程式匯出到目前的工作階段的變數。

trans-unit.source: Without the **Export-ModuleMember** command, only the function is exported.
trans-unit.target: 不含 **Export-modulemember** 命令，匯出的函式。

trans-unit.source: The output shows that both the variable and the function were exported into the session.
trans-unit.target: 輸出顯示變數與函式皆匯出到工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Make a dynamic module available to Get-Module
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 將動態模組提供給 Get 模組

trans-unit.source: This command demonstrates that you can make a dynamic module available to **Get-Module** by piping the dynamic module to **Import-Module**.
trans-unit.target: 此命令示範，您可以讓動態模組可供 **Get-module** 經由管道動態模組，以 **匯入模組**。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the module object that **New-Module** generates to the **Import-Module** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用管線運算子 (|) 將模組物件 **New-module** 產生的 **匯入模組** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the *Name* parameter of **New-Module** to assign a friendly name to the module.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *名稱* 參數 **New-module** 要指派給模組的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: Because **Import-Module** does not return any objects by default, there is no output from this command.
trans-unit.target: 因為 **匯入模組** 不會傳回任何物件依預設，此命令沒有輸出。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses **Get-Module** to get the modules in the session.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會使用 **Get-module** 取得工作階段中的模組。

trans-unit.source: The result shows that **Get-Module** can get the new dynamic module.
trans-unit.target: 結果會顯示 **Get-module** 可以取得新的動態模組。

trans-unit.source: The third command uses the **Get-Command** cmdlet to get the Hello function that the dynamic module exports.
trans-unit.target: 第三個命令會使用 **Get 命令** cmdlet 取得動態模組匯出的 Hello 函式。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Generate a custom object that has exported functions
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 產生自訂物件的已匯出的函式

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the *AsCustomObject* parameter of **New-Module** to generate a custom object that has script methods that represent the exported functions.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用 *AsCustomObject* 參數 **New-module** 來產生自訂物件具有代表匯出函式的指令碼方法。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the **New-Module** cmdlet to generate a dynamic module with two functions, Hello and Goodbye.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用 **New-module** Hello 與 Goodbye 產生兩個函式，動態模組的 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the *AsCustomObject* parameter to generate a custom object instead of the PSModuleInfo object that **New-Module** generates by default.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *AsCustomObject* 參數來產生自訂物件，而非 PSModuleInfo 物件 **New-module** 預設產生。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the custom object in the $m variable.
trans-unit.target: 命令會將自訂物件儲存於 $m 變數。

trans-unit.source: The second command attempts to display the value of the $m variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令嘗試顯示 $m 變數的值。

trans-unit.source: No content appears.
trans-unit.target: 此時不會出現任何內容。

trans-unit.source: The third command uses a pipeline operator to send the custom object to the **Get-Member** cmdlet, which displays the properties and methods of the custom object.
trans-unit.target: 第三個命令使用管線運算子將自訂物件 **Get-member** 指令程式，以顯示屬性和自訂物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The output shows that the object has script methods that represent the Hello and Goodbye functions.
trans-unit.target: 輸出顯示物件具有代表 Hello 與 Goodbye 函式之指令碼方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: The fourth and fifth commands use the script method format to call the Hello and Goodbye functions.
trans-unit.target: 第四個和第五個命令使用指令碼方法格式來呼叫 Hello 與 Goodbye 函式。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Get the results of the script block
trans-unit.target: 範例 6︰ 取得指令碼區塊的結果

trans-unit.source: This command uses the *ReturnResult* parameter to request the results of running the script block instead of requesting a module object.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *ReturnResult* 參數要求執行指令碼區塊，而不是要求模組物件的結果。

trans-unit.source: The script block in the new module defines the SayHello function and then calls the function.
trans-unit.target: 新模組中的指令碼區塊會定義 SayHello 函式，然後呼叫該函式。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -ArgumentList
trans-unit.target: -ArgumentList

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of arguments which are parameter values that are passed to the script block.
trans-unit.target: 指定引數傳遞至指令碼區塊的參數值的陣列。

trans-unit.source: -AsCustomObject
trans-unit.target: -AsCustomObject

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet returns a custom object that represents the dynamic module.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會傳回代表動態模組的自訂物件。

trans-unit.source: The module members are implemented as script methods of the custom object, but they are not imported into the session.
trans-unit.target: 模組成員會以自訂物件的指令碼方法實作，但是不會匯入到工作階段中。

trans-unit.source: You can save the custom object in a variable and use dot notation to invoke the members.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將自訂物件儲存在變數中，並使用點標記法來叫用成員。

trans-unit.source: If the module has multiple members with the same name, such as a function and a variable that are both named A, only one member with each name can be accessed from the custom object.
trans-unit.target: 如果模組有多個成員具有相同的名稱，例如函式和變數，具名的每個名稱只有一個成員可以存取從自訂物件。

trans-unit.source: -Cmdlet
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of cmdlets that this cmdlet exports from the module into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 會將匯出到目前的工作階段之模組的 cmdlet 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Enter a comma-separated list of cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 輸入以逗號分隔的 Cmdlet 清單。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: By default, all cmdlets in the module are exported.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會匯出模組中所有的 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You cannot define cmdlets in a script block, but a dynamic module can include cmdlets if it imports the cmdlets from a binary module.
trans-unit.target: 您不能定義指令碼區塊中的 Cmdlet，但是動態模組可以包含 Cmdlet (若動態模組從二進位模組匯入 Cmdlet)。

trans-unit.source: -Function
trans-unit.target: 式函

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of functions that this cmdlet exports from the module into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 會將匯出到目前的工作階段之模組的函式的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Enter a comma-separated list of functions.
trans-unit.target: 輸入以逗號分隔的函式清單。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: By default, all functions defined in a module are exported.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會匯出模組中定義的所有函式。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies a name for the new module.
trans-unit.target: 指定新模組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a module name to New-Module.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用管線將模組名稱傳送至 New-Module。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an autogenerated name that starts with `__DynamicModule_` and is followed by a GUID that specifies the path of the dynamic module.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是自動產生名稱開頭 `__DynamicModule_` ，後面跟著 GUID，指定動態模組的路徑。

trans-unit.source: -ReturnResult
trans-unit.target: -ReturnResult

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet runs the script block and returns the script block results instead of returning a module object.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會執行指令碼區塊，並傳回指令碼區塊的結果，而不是傳回模組物件。

trans-unit.source: -ScriptBlock
trans-unit.target: -指令碼區塊

trans-unit.source: Specifies the contents of the dynamic module.
trans-unit.target: 指定動態模組的內容。

trans-unit.source: Enclose the contents in braces ( { } ) to create a script block.
trans-unit.target: 使用大括弧 ( { } ) 括住內容以建立指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此為必要參數。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a module name to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送到此指令程式的模組名稱。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSModuleInfo, System.Management.Automation.PSCustomObject, or None
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSModuleInfo、 System.Management.Automation.PSCustomObject，或 None

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet generates a **PSModuleInfo** object, by default.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 會產生 **PSModuleInfo** 物件，預設值。

trans-unit.source: If you use the *AsCustomObject* parameter, it generates a **PSCustomObject** object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 *AsCustomObject* 參數，它會產生 **PSCustomObject** 物件。

trans-unit.source: If you use the *ReturnResult* parameter, it returns the result of evaluating the script block in the dynamic module.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 *ReturnResult* 參數，它會傳回評估動態模組中的指令碼區塊的結果。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to **New-Module** by its alias, **nmo**.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以參考 **New-module** 別名 **nmo**。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.source: Export-ModuleMember
trans-unit.target: Export-ModuleMember

trans-unit.source: Get-Module
trans-unit.target: Get-Module

trans-unit.source: Import-Module
trans-unit.target: Import-Module

trans-unit.source: Remove-Module
trans-unit.target: Remove-Module

trans-unit.source: about_Modules
trans-unit.target: about_Modules
